# Discussion 11

## Student Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
loc <- 'Downloads/CUNY/DATA605/data605/week\ 11/data/'
df <- read.csv(paste0(loc,'student_data.csv'))
```

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(totalStudyTimeMinutes = rowSums(select(df,2:226),na.rm = T)) %>%
  select(c(username, totalStudyTimeMinutes,starts_with("Unit.1.Quiz") | starts_with("Unit.2.Quiz") | starts_with("Unit.3.Quiz")))
df <-   df %>% mutate(meanQuizScores = rowMeans(select(df,3:5),na.rm=T))
```

```{r}
plot(df$meanQuizScores ~ df$totalStudyTimeMinutes)
```
```{r}
model <- lm(df$meanQuizScores ~ df$totalStudyTimeMinutes)
summary(model)
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = totalStudyTimeMinutes, y = meanQuizScores)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```
